title: Metaverse Project Futureverse's Co-Founders Start $50M Venture Fund
description: The Born Ready venture studio will invest in early stage Web3 and metaverse projects.

title: Social media bots suspected in possible FTX crypto price manipulation, reveals report
description:
A new report by the Network Contagion Research Institute (NCRI) suggests that social media activity, especially from inauthentic accounts, may have significantly amplified the value of certain cryptocurrencies listed on the now-defunct FTX exchange. According to the report, Twitter activity surrounding FTX-listed tokens like Gala (GALA) and ImmutableX (IMX) often featured many bot-like and inauthentic […]

The post Social media bots suspected in possible FTX crypto price manipulation, reveals report appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Binance celebrates 150 million registered users
description: Binance, the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchange, just hit a groundbreaking milestone, celebrating a whopping 150 million registered users. This achievement reveals not only a dynamic growth rate but also a new direction in user behavior within the platform. A complex mosaic of recent updates, challenges, and opportunities shapes the story behind this significant moment in ... Read more

title: Bank of England key interest rate hits new 15-year high at 5.25%
description: The Bank of England (BoE) has raised its key interest rate to 5.25%, a level not seen in 15 years. Economists had largely expected the quarter-percentage point increase, marking it as the 14th consecutive hike by the central bank. According to the bank, the driving force behind this move is the realization that certain risks ... Read more

title: Direxion files for Bitcoin and Ether ETFs
description: The daily leveraged and inverse exchange-traded fund (ETF) issuer, Direxion, has filed for Bitcoin (BTC) and Ether (ETH) futures products with the US SEC. The company follows some other prominent industry players that have filed to launch futures ETFs in…

title: Robinhood’s crypto revenue visibly declined in 2023
description: Robinhood Q2 results showed a profit for the first time since going public, but crypto revenue declined in the same quarter. Robinhood’s revenue from cryptocurrency transactions fell 18% to $31 million, according to a quarterly report released on Aug. 2.…

title: Bitcoin Adoption: BRICS Set to Announce New Memberships in Upcoming Summit – Shift in Global Order to De-Dollarisation
description: With more than 20 countries applying for BRICS, South Africa has announced that new member states will be confirmed at the upcoming summit. The global shift towards de-dollarization is suited to drive the adoption of Bitcoin and gold in member states. The BRICS summit is just days away with a global shift expected. As it [...]

title: IOTA 2.0: Introducing Mana to Handle Node-Peering, Voting & Congestion Control, Secure the Network, and Be a Critical Component for the Network
description: BUILD.5 proposes having a Mana station which will play crucial for a balanced ecosystem in IOTA 2.0. Mana Station will serve as the backbone of IOTA 2.0 to balance the supply and demand of Mana. The IOTA Foundation team has been working towards the launch of IOTA 2.0 which will be a zero-fee network offering [...]

title: Binance Processed $90,000,000,000 Worth of Trading Volume in China in May, Despite Country’s Crypto Ban: Report
description:
China reportedly remains a lucrative market for the crypto exchange Binance even though the country made trading digital assets illegal in 2021. The Wall Street Journal reports that two years after the ban, Binance users in China traded $90 billion worth of crypto-related assets in the month of May alone. The news outlet says it […]

The post Binance Processed $90,000,000,000 Worth of Trading Volume in China in May, Despite Country’s Crypto Ban: Report appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
